Popover examples

Heads up! The.wk-popover class here has been overriden to be relatively positioned.

Arrow positioning

You can change the arrow direction by selecting the adequate class.

Top

Now you see me!

<div class="wk-popover wk-position-top-left">
  <div class="wk-popover-body">Now you see me!</div>
</div>
Now you see me!

<div class="wk-popover wk-position-top">
  <div class="wk-popover-body">Now you see me!</div>
</div>
Now you see me!

<div class="wk-popover wk-position-top-right">
  <div class="wk-popover-body">Now you see me!</div>
</div>

Now you see me!

</div>

  <div class="wk-popover-body">Now you see me!</div>
</div>

<div class="wk-popover wk-position-bottom-right">

</div>

User menu popover

This is a special component built on top of popover to display a user menu

My profile

username
first.last@company.com

  • My subscription
  • Change password
User administration

As designated site contact for your organization, you can add, modify or delete user and administrator records.

My Emails
<div class="wk-popover wk-position-top-right wk-user-popover">
  <div class="wk-user-popover-section">
    <h5 class="wk-module-heading">My profile</h5>
    <button type="button" name="button">Logout</button>
    <p>username<br/>                    first.last@company.com</p>
    <ul style="list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0">
      <li><a href="#">My subscription</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">Change password</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
  <div class="wk-user-popover-section">
    <h5 class="wk-module-heading">User administration</h5>
    <p>As designated site contact for your organization, you can add, modify or delete user and administrator records.</p>
    <button type="button" name="button">Go to user administration</button>
  </div>
  <div class="wk-user-popover-section">
    <h5 class="wk-module-heading">My Emails</h5>
    <form>
      <div class="wk-field-item">
        <div class="wk-checkbox-field">
          <label>
            <input type="checkbox" name="choice"/> ARM Weekly summary
          </label>
        </div>
        <div class="wk-checkbox-field">
          <label>
            <input type="checkbox" name="choice"/> ARM Daily News
          </label>
        </div>
      </div>
    </form>
  </div>
</div>
